metadata.feature_description: Configure activity stream module settings and behavior

steps.action: Navigate to Community page with Activity Stream module
steps.expected: Page loads with Activity Stream module visible
steps.actual: Community page loaded successfully with Activity Stream module displaying

steps.action: Enable Edit Mode via Persona Bar
steps.expected: Page enters edit mode with module actions available
steps.actual: Edit mode enabled, module actions menu accessible

steps.action: Click Activity Stream module to select it
steps.expected: Module is selected and ready for settings access

steps.action: Open Admin > Settings from module action menu
steps.actual: Module Settings dialog opened successfully showing Module Settings, Permissions, and Activity Stream tabs

steps.action: Click Activity Stream tab to view module-specific settings
steps.expected: Activity Stream settings panel displays all configuration options
steps.actual: Activity Stream tab opened showing: Enable Activity Stream Editor, File Attachments, Photo Attachments, Max Files Per Journal, Enable View Filters, Enable Grouping, Default Page Size, Maximum Characters

steps.expected: File Attachments and Photo Attachments checkboxes should become disabled
steps.actual: File Attachments and Photo Attachments checkboxes became disabled/grayed out when Enable Editor was unchecked

steps.expected: File Attachments and Photo Attachments checkboxes should become enabled
steps.actual: File Attachments and Photo Attachments checkboxes became enabled again

steps.action: Toggle File Attachments checkbox to unchecked state
steps.expected: File Attachments setting changes to disabled

steps.action: Toggle Photo Attachments checkbox to unchecked state
steps.expected: Photo Attachments setting changes to disabled

steps.action: Change Max Files Per Journal dropdown from 10 to 5
steps.actual: Max Files Per Journal dropdown successfully changed to 5

steps.action: Change Maximum Characters per message dropdown from 250 to 500
steps.actual: Maximum Characters dropdown successfully changed to 500

steps.action: Click Update button to save all modified settings
steps.expected: Settings are saved successfully and dialog closes or shows success message
steps.actual: Server error occurred: 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.' Page redirected to Site Settings page with critical error message: 'A critical error has occurred. Please check the Admin Logs for further details.'

issues: NullReferenceException when saving Activity Stream module settings - settings cannot be persisted

steps.action: Reopen module settings to verify saved values
steps.expected: All previously modified settings should be retained
steps.actual: Unable to verify persistence due to save error in previous test

issues: Settings persistence cannot be verified because the save operation failed with NullReferenceException

observations: The Enable Editor toggle correctly controls the enabled/disabled state of File Attachments and Photo Attachments checkboxes via JavaScript
All settings UI elements are accessible and functional for modification
The settings save functionality has a critical bug causing NullReferenceException when clicking Update

Code in Settings.ascx shows the following configurable options: Enable Editor, Allow Files, Allow Photos, Max Files (1-10), Enable View Filters, Enable Grouping, Default Page Size (5-100), Max Message Length (140-2000), Journal Filters
No emoji panel enable/disable setting found in the UI - this was listed in test scenarios but may be configured elsewhere or not implemented
